lines.text:
[Jeanette has just come into the bedroom after her husband, Jack, has just had sex with the maid and is lying in bed naked]
Would you put something on? God, you look ridiculous with your balls hanging out!

[presumptuously]
Well, honey, do you think we should invite Rick to the wedding?
Well, I'll be busy the day of the ceremony.

[scoffing]
I'll be at a funeral. My own.

[laughs it off]
That's very funny. I like that.
Although I don't like being the butt of all your jokes.
You see it comes very natural. You're such an asshole.
